title: RajaDen
author: RajaDen
content: 1xbit.com is looking to advertise their new promotion BIG 5 - Five Championship-Five Bitcoins. To help spread the word we would like to hire users from Member to legendary rank (Mostly Hero/Legendary) to help us out. If you post frequently in Gambling boards, we want to hire you.      1xbit.com    Signature Campaign     Rewards:     5 jr.member. 30$ week     10x member. 40$ week     15x member. 60$ week     20x Sr Member: 80$ week     25x Hero Member: 100$ week     25x Legendary Member: 120$ week     Rules:       1. payment send Monday to            wednesday     2. Avatar and Signature need to be used till the end of      the campaign.     3. Posts made on games and rounds, micro earnings,      archival, bounty threads and off-topic will be excluded.     Max of 4 posts in local-boards will be counted towards      your quota per week.     4. Posts with less than 150 characters will not be      counted as valid posts.     5. Please make a minimum of 25 constructive posts      weekly.     7. Posts should be spread evenly across 4 days at      st.     8. Any kind of spam is not allowed.     9. Bounty reports are not counted.     10. Forum rank can not be updated after the      registration.     You can't modify or upgrade your rank once registered      on the campaign.     How to Apply     Code:Bitcointalk Username:     Profile
